our projects

The story of heights

The team is comprised of a head constructor, designer, and engineer who grew up together in the neighborhood and desire to contribute positively to community. A day flipping through channels led one of the founders to a home improvement show, and the idea of Heights C and R began.

Using our knowledge in our respective professions we pooled our talents together and started the company. Many completions, and accolades later, we have established Heights as the primer destination for home improvement needs in the city

The community recreation center

The community rec center has been a staple of the neighborhood for over 25 years. The committee gave us the task of revitalizing the center, and make it a more welcoming environment for people to come and enjoy its plentiful resources.

We outfitted the center with a state of the art studio, ping pong tables, and more for the community to enjoy!

6 month completion solar panel roof new activity room
start renovating now

The bathroom revamp and uplift

Tasks to remodel the bathroom from the grown up, we used all of our design and build process for this project. We were able to bring the owners dream true. The end result is feature in Home Renovations Monthly

This was the our first renovation to be featured, the accolade from this article and our client's satisfaction, helped us hone the designs and system we have in place today.

9 month completion award winning all new marble showers
let's talk

The affordable towers

Commissioned by the city, we gut-renovated 3 towers for affordable housing in the city. We were able to make the buildings just as spectacular for people, with just the right amount of tech.

Just because this is an affordable housing project, we did not skimp on the details, nor materials. We believe in providing top quality no matter the project, no matter the reason

6 month completion solar panel roof new activity room new storage room
build your vision now

The modern kitchenette

We renovated the kitchen to take it to the futuristic era. The kitchen now gives the apartment a whole new vibe from its bland appearance before.

The design couple with the added technology spearhead the renovation. We were able to keep it modern, tech savvy, and simple, just like the owners asked

6 month completion new appliances smart tech ready
